AboutUs.title: Renovo&atelier
AboutUs.description:
We are a workshop where every thing gets a second chance and a new breath. 
It is important for us not just to hem or replace the zipper, but to make sure that the clothes are again pleasing, fit comfortably and look decent. 
We care about details and truly love our work - from repairs to custom tailoring and embroidery. 
For us, the value of a thing is measured by the stories that it will continue with you.

FAQAnswers.title1: What are the turnaround times for repairs and tailoring?
FAQAnswers.answer1: The time depends on complexity: basic repairs (hemming, zipper replacement, minor restoration) usually take 1–3 days, more complex alterations or custom tailoring — from 5 to 14 days. We always agree deadlines in advance and strive to deliver earlier, never compromising on quality.
FAQAnswers.title2: Do you work with expensive and delicate materials?
FAQAnswers.answer2: Yes, we confidently work with leather, cashmere, silk, and items with decorative elements. For complex fabrics, we use gentle technologies and an individual approach to preserve the fabric structure and appearance.
FAQAnswers.title3: Can you tailor an item exactly to fit my body?
FAQAnswers.answer3: Absolutely, custom fitting is one of our strengths. We clarify your preferences, take precise measurements, and offer solutions that will be comfortable to wear and look neat according to the item’s cut.
FAQAnswers.title: Answers to questions

feedback1.name: Daria A.
feedback1.text: The repair was done perfectly — the seams are straight, just like on a new item. The craftsmen are truly attentive to details and do not cut corners on quality. I picked up my coat ahead of schedule and now wear it with pleasure.

feedback2.name: Anna B.
feedback2.text: “The best atelier where I've ever had my clothes fixed.” The embroidery and zipper replacement were done neatly; you can’t even tell there was a repair — the result exceeded expectations. I recommend it if you're after reliability and a personal approach.

feedback3.name: Maria F.
feedback3.text: “The remake of my old dress is pure delight, as if it was sewn anew.” The team really listens and gives honest suggestions about what would look better and last longer. The fit became perfect, now it's my favorite thing to wear.

feedback4.name: Alex M.
feedback4.text: “I entrusted them with a leather jacket with scuffs and a tricky tear — the result is like fine jewelry work.” You can feel their professionalism and love for the craft. The jacket looks even better than before, the job was fast and with real care.
